title: Apple reportedly working on a hardware subscription service for iPhones
content:
Like many other tech companies, Apple has increased its focus on subscription services over the past few years. There’s the Apple Music streaming service, Apple TV+ for movies and television, Apple Arcade for games, iCloud+ for cloud storage, and more. Now it seems the company might jump into the world of hardware subscriptions, if a

The post Apple reportedly working on a hardware subscription service for iPhones appeared first on xda-developers.
description: Apple is working on a subscription service for buying iPhones and other devices, according to a new industry report.
